Index >  PageSize

PageSize

Description

Returns or sets the page size the Source uses to acquire image data.

Data type

EnumDWT_CapSupportedSizes (short)

Syntax

.PageSize = ...;

Remarks

Allowed ValuesPage size
EnumDWT_CapSupportedSizes.TWSS_NONE(0)None

Set this property after OpenSource() and before AcquireImage().

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.
